mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMERS (CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, PASSWORD, SSN, PHOEN_NUMBER, CITY, ADDRESS, POSTAL_CODE) VALUES (#{customerID}, #{customerName}, #{password}, #{ssn}, #{phone}, #{city}, #{address}, #{postalCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CUSTOMERS SET PHOEN_NUMBER = #{phone}, CITY = #{city}, ADDRESS = #{address}, POSTAL_CODE = #{postalCode}, PASSWORD = #{password} WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerID}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerID}
